name: 2017 Audi Q7 3.0T Premium quattro
description: Standard features for the Premium trim include 18-inch alloy wheels (19-inchers with the V6), xenon headlights, automatic wipers, LED running lights and taillights, power-folding heated mirrors, a panoramic sunroof, roof rails, front and rear parking sensors, forward collision warning with pedestrian detection

name: 2017 Audi Q7 3.0T Premium quattro
description: Standard features for the Premium trim include 18-inch alloy wheels (19-inchers with the V6), xenon headlights, automatic wipers, LED running lights and taillights, power-folding heated mirrors, a panoramic sunroof, roof rails, front and rear parking sensors, forward collision warning with pedestrian detection

name: 2017 Audi A4 Prestige
description: The 2017 A4 Prestige comes with a 2.0L turbocharged four-cylinder engine good for 252 hp and 273 lb-ft of torque. The A4 Prestige comes standard with front wheel drive, while Quattro all-wheel drive is optional. With front wheel drive it achieves up to 25 mpg city/33 mpg highway in EPA estimates.

name: Bmw M2
description: The new BMW M2 Coup√© is getting ready to once again set the benchmark in its class. With an outstanding combination of performance, agility and precision

name: bmw m2 horsepower
description: The M2's snorty twin-turbo 3.0-liter inline-six is a sweetheart of an engine, and it pumps out 405 horsepower and 406 pound-feet of torque. That combination reaches the rear wheels via a standard six-speed manual transmission or an optional seven-speed dual-clutch automatic.
